name: Physical Education
description: Start build up your body with this starter pack. 10 times of any physical activity per unit.

name: House keeping
description: Clean your living space or cook something. 1 action per unit.

name: Reading
description: Any readable item is acceptable. 10 pages per unit.

name: Coding
description: Work hours doesn't count. 1 hour per unit.

name: Diaring
description: Thoughts and feelings fixed on paper. 1 action. Can't be overdone.
